example.parse: (S (VP (IV3MS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يذكر) (SBAR-SBJ-1 (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC الاتفاقات)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS عقد) (NP-OBJ (NP (PVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الاتحاد)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدول) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتوسطية) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الشريكة))))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM متشابهة) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حد) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN بعيد))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاتفاق)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يوقع) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-3))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM لبنان)))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: with the agreement signed by Lebanon
